WaveSoundBuffer.PhaseVocoder.pitch

機能/意味
Scale in frequency axis direction
タイプ
WaveSoundBuffer.PhaseVocoderクラスのプロパティ (読み書き可能)
説明
　Represents the scale in the frequency axis direction. You can also set a value.
　The number that can be specified is a number greater than 0.0.
　Specifying 1.0 does not change the scale in the frequency axis direction (the pitch does not change).
　For example, if you specify 1.0594630943593, the pitch will increase by a semitone.
　For example, if you specify 0.9438743126817, the pitch will be lowered by a semitone.
　Even if both the time and pitch properties are 1, the Phase Vocoder filter works, the sound quality is slightly degraded, and it uses CPU time. If you want to keep both at 1, you may want to remove this filter from the filter array.
　Changes to this property take effect in real time, but due to buffering, it may take up to two seconds for it to actually play.
